issue.title: [CI][Python] AMD64 macOS 11 Python 3 job fails on master on pip install
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18251](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18251). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14589>

but that's not the case so it requires more investigation.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18251?focusedCommentId=17629008) by Raúl Cumplido (raulcd):*
`[~jorisvandenbossche]` `[~alenka]` Any idea what might be the cause for this failures? I will try and investigate

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18251?focusedCommentId=17629013) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Not directly an idea. This build has been failing for some time (with a cython test failure) but it seems only recently started to fail with this installation issue.

From commits on master, 4 days ago test failure: https://github.com/apache/arrow/actions/runs/3363608185/jobs/5576970377
3 days ago installation failure: https://github.com/apache/arrow/actions/runs/3372998317/jobs/5597074003

A relevant difference is a pip 22.2.2 -> 22.3 update.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18251?focusedCommentId=17634031) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14614
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14614>
